introduction: An obsession that haunts a family...A dying man's last wish...A girl on a mission to shatter her family's delusions...Who are these people and what is their mission?Welcome to the mad mad world of the Soadies - The most magnificent fans of Roadies!13 years ago, Banto Sodhi passed away and left for his wife Santo, the task of finding a Roadie in the family....and so, the Sodhis became the Soadies. With a son who raps in anger, a grandson who is a complete blonde and granddaughter who hates Roadies, will Santo ever be able to complete her husband's dying wish?
